bug.author: szha
bug.description:
In <denchmark-link:http://gluon-nlp.mxnet.io/master/api/modules/embedding.html#gluonnlp.embedding.TokenEmbedding>TokenEmbedding class API doc</denchmark-link> , the method is mentioned which does not exist. Two options for the fix:
add a proxy method for TokenEmbedding.from_file in gluonnlp.embedding namespace. update the documentation so that it refers to gluonnlp.embedding.TokenEmbedding.from_file.

comments.comment: This is a typo, see PR: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmlc/gluon-nlp/pull/550>#550</denchmark-link>
